snippet: “Eclipse,” by the choreographer Jonah Bokaer and the visual artist Anthony McCall, has inaugurated the Brooklyn Academy of Music’s intimate new theater, the BAM Fisher.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews the premiere of Eclipse, a collaboration between choreographer Jonah Bokaer and visual artist Anthony McCall, at the inauguration of the BAM Fisher theater in the Richard B Fisher Building at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: “Eclipse,” by the choreographer Jonah Bokaer and the visual artist Anthony McCall, has inaugurated the Brooklyn Academy of Music’s intimate new theater, the BAM Fisher.

headline.seo: ‘Eclipse,’ by Jonah Bokaer and Anthony McCall, at BAM Fisher
headline.main: Darting and Stuttering Through Many Points of Light
headline.print_headline: Darting and Stuttering Through Many Points of Light
